reviewText:
This is a profile of the existence of the automobile in the United States. Features some of the earliest vehicles with film clips and as it goes along actual vehicles. many people with vehicle backgrounds comment.

Includes data about the first drive-thru restaurant, the initial roads, the Interstate system, vehicle design, vehicle power, and many more things about the auto industry. Includes the impact of Hollywood on the industry, interesting and insightful.

The extras features a number of beautiful drives to take, includes distance and approximate time to drive.
FROM A 45 YEAR AUTOMOTIVE INDUSTRY  VETERAN, THIS IS ONE OF THE BEST FILMS MADE ON MY INDUSTRY
